title.rendered: HND students visit The Design Museum

content.rendered: A group of about 16 students doing their Level 4 HND Business programme and 3 teachers of Regent College London visited The Design Museum on the 8th of May 2019. The museum showcases some interesting exhibitions. The museum champions design and the impact it has on the world and introduces the incredible people behind it. Design is about innovation, technology, creativity and craftsmanship and influences our lives in more ways than we can imagine. The visit was a self-guided tour and lasted for an hour. The students found the museum very interesting and relevant to the Innovation and Commercialisation module that they are currently studying.
